item.title: web3 Security Audit
item.description: the web3 Security Audit Extreme Measure : Separating everything with already hardened laptops. You can DIY your laptop like that, but it needs tons of time and research, so if you like this stuff, it is always good to know but not recommended for non-tech people. ðŸ”—General Usage Tips : General usage suggestions applied to all computers and operating systems. BUT I will not suggest using Windows. Linux > MacOS > Windows.
